title: Fuel bowser crashes in Kurunegala
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A fuel bowser met with an accident near the Kurunegala town on the Dambulla main road at around 3.00 AM this morning.
According to the News 1st correspondent, the bowser was carrying 13,200 L of petrol from Colombo to Kinniya.
